title: Lobbying for favorable legislation
description: 権威主義的な政府による攻撃や、妥協的な法律や不公平な税制から、どのようにして自分たちを守ることができるのか。

f6_assessments.q0: I agree with this proposal because  I think that its  important that we have favorable legislation, privacy, tax reduction and a positive environment for mass adoption of cryptocurrencies.Living in an authoritarian country facing economic collapse due to corrupt politicians implementing insane ideas, I specially see the value of bringing legislation favouring cryptocurrency.
f6_assessments.q1: The budget for this project is reasonable .
f6_assessments.q2:
The verifiability of this is clear. Metrics have been identified, a roadmap has been laid out to be carried out.
Metrics include 
Number of jurisdictions favored through lobbying
Number of laws that have been modified
Number of experts in regulation, lawyers and other members involved
Number of partnerships and collaborations with organizations and non-profits that work in the same cause
Number of votes of politicians engaged

importance: そのため、有利な法律、プライバシー、減税、暗号通貨の大量導入のためのポジティブな環境を整えます。
success: 私たちは、暗号導入を危うくするような法案を遅らせたり、撤回させたりして、地域コミュニティやCoincenterのような組織を支援しました。
